extension.description: This plugin allows you to see Delfi TV.
Selle plugina abil saate vaadata Delfi TV.
extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws. Plugin is as-is, without any warranty.
Plugin on as-is ilma igasuguse garantiita.

extension.description: This plugin allows you to see content from ERR portal jupiter.err.ee
Selle plugina abil saate vaadata jupiter.err.ee sisu
extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws. Plugin is as-is, without any warranty.

extension.news:
- 0.0.5 - Võimalus valida värve
- 0.0.4 - Vene kino piltide leidmise parandus, koodipuhastus
- 0.0.3 - lisandusid postrid, et lemmikute all oleks saate/sarja pilt näha. Pythoni sõltuvus eemaldatud, et saaks sama pluginat paigaldada nii Leia kui Matrix versioonile. Bugi #1
- 0.0.2 - uus valik võimaldab keelata piltide laadimise (kasulik aeglastel seadmetel nagu näiteks RaspberryPi)
- 0.0.1 - esmane väljalase

extension.summary: Watch the latest shows from Kanal2

extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws. Plugin is as-is, without any warranty.
